text: Bigū ej Rasul: "Ojo şumoro ʙa cizhoe ʙehtar az inho ogoh kunam?" Baroi onon, ki parhezgorī peşa kardand va az azoʙaş tarsidand, dar nazdi Parvardigoraşon ʙihişthoest, ki dar zeri qasrhoi on darjoho ravon ast. Onho ʙo hamsaroni pokiza az hajzu nifos va xulqi ʙad ʙo rizoijati Alloh çovidona dar on ço xohand ʙud. Va Alloh az sifathoi neku ʙadi ʙandagonaş ogoh ast va ʙa holaşon donost
